Package yafgen

Class Summary
AboutDialog  
FractalIFS The class FractalIFS implements an Iterated Function System, based on the defined matrix.
FractalImage FractalImage represents the graphicsl representation of a fractal on the screen.
FractalIterationFunction FractalIterationFunction is the base class for fractals that represent a graphical image of iterations.
FractalJulia The class FractalJulia implements a fractal called "Juliamenge".
FractalJumper The class FractalJumper implements a fractal called "Jumper".
FractalMandelbrot The class FractalMandelbrot implements a fractal called "Mandelbrot".
FractalNLF The class FractalNLF implements a fractal based on Non-Linear Functions.
FractalParameters class FractalParameters stores all the values that are changed by the user interface and are important for the calculations
FractalRasterIteration FractalRasterIteration is the base class for fractals that can be represented by images on the complex plane.
MacOSAboutHandler  
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
YaFGenMainFrame .Y.et .A.other .F.ractal .Gen.erator YAFG This Java application calculates and displays several fractals
